0P00009SE4.TW.long_name: Nomura Global High Dividend Fund Dividend pay-Quarterly TWD
0P00009SE4.TW.summary: The fund invests in stocks and bonds that are listed on the stocks exchanges of Japan, Hong Kong, South Korea, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, India, Australia, New Zealand, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Switzerland, Belgium, the Netherlands, Italy, Spain, Ireland, Russia, Austria, Greece, the United States, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, South Africa and Taiwan.

0P0000PRW7.L.long_name: OpenWorld plc - Russell Investments Global High Dividend Equity B StgÂ£ INCOME
0P0000PRW7.L.summary:
The Fund aims to provide long-term capital appreciation from a portfolio comprised predominantly of Equities and Equity-Related Instruments. 
 The Fund will predominantly invest in Equities and Equity-Related Instruments that are listed, traded or dealt in on Regulated Markets worldwide. At least two-thirds of the Fundâs total assets will be invested in Equities and Equity-Related Instruments that are issued by or in respect of High Dividend Companies worldwide.
0P0000PRW7.L.manager_bio:
Faisal Rahman is Director, Canadian Money Market for Manulife Asset Management Limited. He is a member of the Money Market investment management team, which is responsible for money market management for institutional and sub-advised mandates in both Canada and the United States.
Previously, Faisal worked as a fixed income portfolio manager at Equitable Life of Canada and as a portfolio administrator at TAL Private Management Ltd. Faisal holds the Chartered Financial Analyst designation.

0P0000SARS.F.long_name: Veritas Global Equity Income EUR Retl Inc NAV
0P0000SARS.F.summary:
The investment objective of Veritas Global Equity Income Fund is to provide a high and growing level of income and thereafter to preserve capital in real terms over the long term.
Veritas Global Equity Income Fund will seek to achieve its investment objective by principally investing in global equities listed or traded on Recognised Exchanges. Investments may also be made in global securities (including, but not exclusively, sovereign and corporate index linked bonds, corporate, sovereign and convertible bonds, which may be fixed and/or floating rate and shall generally be investment grade) which are listed or traded on a Recognised Exchange, subject to the Investment Restrictions listed in the main body of the Prospectus. The Veritas Global Equity Income Fund will not invest in leveraged notes.
0P0000SARS.F.manager_bio: Director, Fund Manager and Head of Global Research. Director of Veritas Asset Management (UK) Limited and Fund Manager of the Real Return Global Fund and Veritas Global Focus Fund. Joined The Real Return Group in 2003. Analyst and Portfolio Manager WP Stewart 2001 to 2003. Analyst and Portfolio Manager Newton Investment Management 1996 to 2001. Tax Consultant, Price Waterhouse 1993 to 1996. Education: Chartered Accountant, BSc, ASIP.

0P0000W8Y8.L.long_name: LF Canlife Global Equity Income Fund B Accumulation
0P0000W8Y8.L.summary: The CF Canlife Global Equity Income Fund aims to provide income with the potential for some long-term capital growth principally through investment in global shares. The Sub-fund principally invests in shares on a global basis across a wide range of geographies, sectors and market capitalisations which the Investment Manager believes offer attractive dividend yields. The Sub-fund may also invest in collective investment schemes, cash, money market instruments, other transferable securities and derivatives and forward transactions for the purposes of Efficient Portfolio Management.
0P0000W8Y8.L.manager_bio: David Pastor, CFA joined Setanta Asset Management in 2007. He has over ten years experience in the asset management industry, the last 9 on an analyst/fund manager capacity. He has a BS in Business Administration from Universidad de Burgos and is a member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA). David is also a CFA charterholder.

0P0000YOF4.L.long_name: Jupiter Global Equity Income Fund Instl Accumulation units
0P0000YOF4.L.summary: The Fund aims to provide income together with the prospect of capital growth in order to achieve a return, net of fees, higher than that provided by the MSCI AC World Index over the long term (at least five years). At least 70% of the Fund is invested in shares of companies based anywhere in the world. Up to 30% of the Fund may be invested in other assets, including open-ended funds (including funds managed by Jupiter and its associates), cash and near cash.
0P0000YOF4.L.manager_bio: Gregory joined Jupiter in April 2005 as a senior investment writer before joining our European equities team as an assistant fund manager in October 2007. He currently manages the European portion of the Jupiter Global Managed Fund. He is also manager of the Jupiter European Income Fund. Before joining Jupiter, Gregory worked in various roles, including senior portfolio analyst for State Street Global Advisors, head of the UK desk for Standard & Poors and as an investment correspondent for both Globalnet Financial and Bridge Information Systems. Gregory has an MSc in Investment Management from Cass Business School, City University, an MSc in International Relations (Econ) from the LSE, and a degree in French and Italian from the University of Bristol.

0P00015E9N.L.long_name: Valu-Trac Investment Funds ICVC Equity Income Fund A GBP Net Inc
0P00015E9N.L.summary: The objective of the Fund is to obtain a yield higher than that generally available from investment in global equities* whilst, over the longer term, achieving growth in both capital and income.

0P00017LUE.L.long_name: Davy Defensive Equity Income Fund H GBP Acc
0P00017LUE.L.summary: The aim of the Fund is to provide long-term capital growth, with reduced levels of volatility compared to global equity markets. The Fund reduces risk by investing in large global companies that pay out above average dividend yields and employs an options strategy to provide some downside protection against significant market falls.
0P00017LUE.L.manager_bio: Mark Seavers is the Chief Investment Officer of Davy Asset Management. He is the chairperson of the Davy Asset Management Asset Allocation Committee and is responsible for coordinating and overseeing the investment teams and strategies. Mark is also the Lead Fund Manager for Davy Asset Managementsâ suite of Global Equity Income products. Mark joined Davy Asset Management in 2014, when Davy Asset Management acquired Prescient Investment Managers (previously Allied Irish Bank Investment Managers, AIBIM). Mark began his investment career in 1988 at AIBIM and was appointed to the Portfolio Management Team in 1992. Mark holds a Master of Arts in Economics and a Masters of Finance from University College Dublin.

0P0001C0H8.L.long_name: TB Evenlode Global Income Fund B Accumulation GBP
0P0001C0H8.L.summary:
The investment objective of TB Evenlode Global Income is to provide income and capital growth over Rolling Periods of 5 years with an emphasis on income.
At least 80% of TB Evenlode Global Income will be invested in equity securities of companies listed on international exchanges.

0P0001HBRK.L.long_name: TB Chawton Investment Funds - TB Chawton Global Equity Income Fund B GBP Accumulation
0P0001HBRK.L.summary: The Fund aims to provide a growing income stream and to grow capital over the long term. Each part of this objective will have equal weighting.
0P0001HBRK.L.manager_bio: Mr. Michael Crawford joined Bessemer Investment Management LLC in January 2012, having previously served as Head of European and UK Equities for Bessemer Group (U.K.) Limited, an affiliate of Bessemer Investment Management, from 2005 through 2007. From 2007 to 2011, Mr. Crawford served as Director and Portfolio Manager at Credit Suisse Asset Management and, subsequently, Senior Fund Manager at Liverpool Victoria Portfolio Managers Limited. Mr. Crawford received his BSc from University of Exeter in 1985 and an MBA from Cranfield School of Management in 1996.

BGHEF.AS.long_name: BNP Paribas Global Income Multi-Factor Equity Fund Classic
BGHEF.AS.summary: The Sub fund invests globally, primarily in a diversified portfolio of equity securities. The asset manager actively manages the portfolio in order to achieve the objective. The Sub fund may also invest in other asset classes that are eligible including other transferable securities and units of collective investment schemes.
BGHEF.AS.manager_bio: Jorma Korhonen joined Fidelity in 1996. He worked as a research analyst in Fidelity's London and Boston offices before becoming assistant manager on the global funds range. Jorma took over the management of the FF Switzerland, FF Italy and FF Iberia Fund in January of 2002.
